bug.author: agibsonccc
bug.summary: Libnd4j fails to compile on armv8 jetson nano
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
LIbnd4j fails to compile due to the attached screenshot <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1144306/74627008-e52a8480-5194-11ea-8aff-061bf01c538b.jpg></denchmark-link>
Please describe our issue, along with:
expected behavior Compiles encountered behavior Does not compile
<denchmark-h:h4>Version Information</denchmark-h>
Snapshots Please indicate relevant versions, including, if relevant:
Deeplearning4j version Snapshot Platform information (OS, etc) Jetson nano Jetpack 4.3. CUDA version, if used 10.0 NVIDIA driver version, if in use
<denchmark-h:h4>Additional Information</denchmark-h>
Where applicable, please also provide:
Full log or exception stack trace (ideally in a Gist: gist.github.com) pom.xml file or similar (also in a Gist)
<denchmark-h:h4>Contributing</denchmark-h>
If you'd like to help us fix the issue by contributing some code, but would like guidance or help in doing so, please mention it!
